channel.title: CVE Feed for knowledgecode -- date-and-time
channel.description: The latest CVEs for knowledgecode -- date-and-time

item.title: CVE-2020-26289|2024-08-04T15:56:04.321Z -- knowledgecode -- date-and-time
item.description: date-and-time is an npm package for manipulating date and time. In date-and-time before version 0.14.2, there a regular expression involved in parsing which can be exploited to to cause a denial of service. This is fixed in version 0.14.2.
